summary: An ordinance relating to the construction of a trunk sewer together with a storm water overflow, known as the West Montlake Trunk Sewer, Unit No. 2, as authorized by Ordinance No. 83003, creating Local Improvement District No. 6066, providing for the sale of the warrants and bonds of the district to the City Employees' Retirement System at private sale, and amending Section 4 of said ordinance.
